DOC.brief_summary: This study examine experience moral value conflict among genetic counselor . Previous research show value conflict exist among genetic counselor , little known nature consequence conflict . This sub-study `` Manifestations Consequences Moral Distress Among Genetic Service Providers : An Exploratory Study , '' include genetic counselor , nurse medical geneticist . Genetic counselor recruit value-conflict sub-study among participate Moral Distress study . Participants interview in-depth telephone experience moral value conflict client . The interview cover following : situation counselor disagreed client 's decision view moral level ; counselor 's thought process session conflict arise ; counselor 's feeling emotion associated session involve moral value conflict ; counselor 's current previous work setting ; counselor 's view role responsibility client 's decision ; challenge client 's value decision ; preparation value conflict .
DOC.brief_title: Genetic Counselors ' Experiences Moral Value Conflicts With Clients
DOC.detailed_description: Genetic counselor may face situation disagree moral level view decision client . These moral value conflict counselor client may negative emotional consequence counselor . Little known range source conflict , approach counselor take address , impact counselor 's life career . This study seek gain insight nature , source , consequence moral value conflict among genetic counselor semi-structured in-depth interview approximately 30 genetic counselor . Interview question nest within interview large study entitle `` Moral Distress Suffering Genetics Professionals '' . The discussion center personal experience moral value conflict counselor client . Interviews transcribe subject thematic analysis . Such analysis result identification common theme run interview . An understanding value conflict may allow future intervention minimize negative effect event .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION / EXCLUSION CRITERIA : A sample approximately 30 genetic counselor interview study .
